text: Yahia Mufarrih (born September 18, 1968) is a Yemeni judoka. He competed internationally for Yemen at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==Career== Mufarrih competed in the middleweight division at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, Spain. In the first round he was drawn against Nikola Filipov from Bulgaria, but he did not advance any further in the competition, as he lost the bout. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Yemeni male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Yemen Category:Judoka at the 1992 Summer Olympics
title: Yahia Mufarrih
